content: As an AI language model, I cannot give financial advice, but using the same exfoliator for both face and body can save money on purchasing separate products. However, it's important to keep in mind that the skin on your face is different from the skin on your body and requires different types of care. Using a stronger body exfoliator on your face can be too harsh and cause irritation or even damage to the delicate skin. It's important to choose an exfoliator that's specifically formulated for facial use if you are going to use it on your face.
